William_Michael_Morgan:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = William Michael Morgan | image = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1993|05|13}}{{cite web |url=http://www.cmt.com/artists/william-michael-morgan/biography/ |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150829105736/http://www.cmt.com/artists/william-michael-morgan/biography/ |url-status=dead |archive-date=August 29, 2015 |title=About William Michael Morgan |work=CMT }} | birth_place = | origin = [[Vicksburg, Mississippi]], United States | instrument = {{hlist|Vocals|guitar}} | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = {{hlist|Singer|songwriter}} | years_active = 2009–present | associated_acts = | website = {{URL|williammichaelmorgan.com}} }} '''William Michael Morgan''' (born May 13, 1993) is an American [[country music]] singer from [[Vicksburg, Mississippi]]. He was signed to [[Warner Bros. Records|Warner Bros. Nashville]].{{cite web|author= |url=http://www.warnermusicnashville.com/william-michael-morgan |title=Warner Music Nashville William Michael Morgan |publisher=Warnermusicnashville.com |date= |accessdate=2015-11-17}} His debut single "[[I Met a Girl (William Michael Morgan song)|I Met a Girl]]", reached number two on the [[Country Airplay]] chart and number eight on the [[Hot Country Songs]] chart in October 2016; the song was co-written with [[Sam Hunt]].{{cite web|author=|url=http://tasteofcountry.com/william-michael-morgan-i-met-a-girl/ |title=ToC Critic's Pick: William Michael Morgan, 'I Met a Girl' |publisher=Tasteofcountry.com |date= 19 August 2015|accessdate=2015-11-17}} The album's second single "Missing", was released to country radio on November 7, 2016. His debut studio album ''[[Vinyl (William Michael Morgan album)|Vinyl]]'', was released on September 30, 2016. Morgan parted ways with Warner Bros. Nashville in January 2019. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:18em;"| Album details ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
